Verify the 'Submit' button is enabled, has background color #4CAF50, text color #FFFFFF, font size 16px, padding 12px 24px, and border radius 4px
Verify the 'Submit' button hover background color transitions to #45a049 over 200ms
Open 'https://example.com/product/details'
Verify the main product image has source 'product_main.jpg', rendered dimensions 800x600px, alt text 'Luxury Watch', natural dimensions 1200x900px, and loads within 500ms
Verify the 'Email' input field displays placeholder text 'user@example.com', has initial border 1px solid #CCCCCC, and font family 'Arial'
Verify the 'Email' input field, when focused, changes border to 2px solid #007BFF and background color to #E6F7FF
Verify the 'About Us' navigation link is visible, has text color #333333, font size 14px, and font weight 400
Verify the 'About Us' navigation link, when active/selected, changes text color to #0056B3 and shows underline border-bottom 2px solid #0056B3
Play the video at 'https://example.com/video/intro.mp4'
Verify the video player is not muted
Click the 'Fullscreen' button
Verify the video player enters fullscreen mode within 1s
Verify the play/pause button has aria-label 'Play video' when paused
Verify the play/pause button has aria-label 'Pause video' when playing
Verify the table on the 'User List' page displays exactly 10 user entries
Verify the 'Username' column text is left-aligned
Verify the 'Status' column text is centered
Verify the total user count label displays 'Total Users: 100'
Click the 'Open Dialog' button
Verify the modal dialog is visible, centered horizontally at x=50%, vertically at y=50% of the viewport, with width 400px and height 300px
Verify the background overlay has opacity 0.7 and color rgba(0,0,0,0.7)
Scroll down the page by 500px
Verify the header remains sticky at top: 0px, has height 60px, background color #FFFFFF, and bottom border 1px solid #E0E0E0
Click the 'Language' dropdown
Verify the dropdown menu becomes visible below the button, containing exactly 5 language options
Verify each language option has padding 8px 15px and font size 15px
Verify the product card element has width 300px, padding 20px, border radius 8px, and 1px solid #E0E0E0 border
Verify its internal elements (image, title, price) are vertically aligned with 15px margin-bottom between them
Verify the progress bar initial value is 25%, represented by green fill color #28A745
Verify the progress bar animates smoothly to 75% progress within 800ms upon data load, maintaining height 10px
Verify all footer navigation links are visible, have text color #6C757D, font size 13px, and no text decoration
Verify all footer navigation links, on hover, change text color to #007BFF and an underline appears
Click the date input field
Verify the calendar picker appears
Verify the '2024-07-20' date cell is highlighted with background color #007BFF and text color #FFFFFF
Trigger a success notification
Verify the banner appears at top right (top: 20px, right: 20px) within 300ms, displaying text 'Item added successfully', background color #D4EDDA, and text color #155724
Verify the user's profile picture has source 'avatar.jpg', rendered dimensions 60x60px, border radius 50% (circular), and 2px solid #CCCCCC border
Hover over the 'Info' icon
Verify a tooltip becomes visible at x: 10px right and y: 5px below the icon, displays text 'Additional information here', has background color #333333, and text color #FFFFFF
Verify the 'Delete' button is disabled, has opacity 0.6, background color #DC3545, text color #FFFFFF, and does not respond to click interactions
Type 'This is a test message.' into the 'Comment' text area
Verify the character count updates to '23/140'
Verify the 'Comment' text area height is 100px and font size is 14px
Load 'https://example.com/homepage'
Verify the advertisement banner at the bottom has source 'ad_banner.png', loads within 1s, rendered dimensions 970x90px, and displays a small 'Ad' watermark at top-left corner with opacity 0.8
Search for 'laptop'
Verify exactly 10 search results are displayed
Verify each search result's product image has source starting with 'https://cdn.example.com/product_images/'
Verify each search result's price text color is #E60023
